title: Blue Flower Girl
subtitle: Watercolor
alt: long brown haired girl with a messy bun, red cheeks, and blue eyes. In the same color blue, there are four flours at each corner.
description:
2025 

This was another one of my bold color watercolor pieces. This piece was the final piece of my series on learning to paint with stronger colors. I really wanted the hair to look and feel dark and the eyes and flowers to pop. I really enjoy working with contrasting colors like red and blue.
